title: What's happening to me?
creator_credit: Greg ingram, Steve Walsh, Stephen Smallwood and Consolidated Productions
brief_description: An honest, sympathetic and humorous animated presentation of the main changes occuring in females and males during puberty. Covers the growth of pubic and other body hair, menstruation, readiness for reproduction, growth of breasts, masturbation, erections, wet dreams, voice changes, pimples, different rates of onset of puberty and physical diferences between those of the same age and sex. Based on the book by Peter Mayle and Arthur Robins.
